channel.title: 718 titleset command help

item.title: 718 titleset command help
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

On reduction (matrix) when i do the titleset command the command is always this colour and there are no caps in both words, does anyone know how to change it? http://gyazo.com/dbe9a741a9f9750f39728a4875171705

the command is
Code:
case "titleset": if(!player.isExtremeDonator() && player.getRights() == 0) { player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("SimpleMessage", "You've to be a extreme donator to use this feature."); return true; } String title = ""; for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++) title += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? "" : " "); player.setLoyalty(title); player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("SimpleMessage", "You set your loyalty title to: "+player.getLoyalty()+"!" + "To activate and use your custom title, do ::title 666!"); return true;

Read full topic
